section.name: Getting Started with OpenEdge Modules
section.p: This document (as well as the others in this section) provide an introduction to OpenEdge Modules and how to use it within a project.

subsection.name: Overview of the Getting Started Documentation

tr.td: This document provides links to the various distributions available for OpenEdge Modules.
For those who want to build OpenEdge Modules from source, this document provides step-by-step instructions on the build process.
This document provides a short tutorial on the usage of OpenEdge Modules.
If you are interested in extending OpenEdge Modules, this document gives you some hints and how-to's.
